themes: exclusion of women artists from underrepresented groups
systemic barriers for women in arts funding
concern about gender equity in Texas
call for policy revision to include women
key_phrases: Access remains limited, especially for women artists
notably excluded from the City’s definition of underrepresented or marginalized communities
women’s rights are increasingly under threat
gender equity is far from realized
systemic barriers in funding, recognition, and leadership opportunities
revise its definitions and frameworks to reflect the lived realities of women artists
barriers_identified: exclusion of women from underrepresented or marginalized community definitions
systemic barriers in funding, recognition, and leadership opportunities for women artists
solutions_proposed: revise definitions and frameworks to include women as an underrepresented group
